Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: gains losses on extinguishment of debt
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance initial public offering
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): acquired in process research and development
acquired in process research and development net of tax
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire in process research and development
purchased in process research and development
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire other property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from payments for long term loans for related parties
proceeds from sale of intangible assets
proceeds from sale of other property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments for proceeds from short term investments
payments to acquire short term investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments
proceeds from sale of longterm investments
proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts and other receivables
increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
Deferred Income Taxes: increase decrease in deferred income taxes
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal
gain loss on disposition of intangible assets
gain loss on sale of business
gain loss on sale of investments
impairment of intangible assets indefinitelived excluding goodwill
net marketing investigation charges accrued paid
other operating activities cash flow statement
research and development asset acquired other than through business combination written off

__unmapped__: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
